channel.title: Sonora Writers Group
channel.description: The Sonora Writers Group is comprised of both published and aspiring authors, who have found themselves in the heart of California’s historic Gold Rush Country. We are all writers and poets whose works run within many genres, and who have come together to promote the written word and support each other in finding their voices within the art of writing.

Conference Website

More information

Come join the annual Gold Rush Writers Conference, Sept 27th, 28th, & 29th in 2024 , at the historic Leger Hotel in picturesque Mokelumne Hill where writing professionals will guide you to a publishing bonanza through a series of panels, specialty talks, workshops, and celebrity lectures.

Go one-on-one with successful writers in the field. The conference includes a picnic supper Friday evening, Saturday dinner and Sunday lunch. NOTE! Change of date to Sept was caused by hotel renovation!
